SEARCH
Package hw4

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
hw4.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
The Graph class represents an undirected graph.

  • Method Details

    • addNode

      public boolean addNode(String label)
      Adds a node with label label to this graph.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to add to this graph.
      Returns:
      true if the node was added successfully. false if label is invalid.

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode(String label)
      Removes the node with label label, along with all edges leading to it.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to wipe from existence.

    • addEdge

      public boolean addEdge(String label_1, String label_2)
      Adds an undirected edge between the nodes with labels label_1 and label_2.
      Parameters:
      label_1 - the label of one of the two nodes to create an edge between.
      label_2 - the label of the other of the two nodes to create an undirected edge between.
      Returns:
      true if both nodes exist in this graph, false otherwise.

    • numNodes

      public int numNodes()
      Returns the number of nodes in this graph.
      Returns:
      nodes.size()

      public int numEdges()
      Returns the total number of undirected edges in this graph.
      Returns:
      num_edges

      Returns the number of nodes currently infected.

      public String getRandom()
      Returns a random node label in this graph.
      Returns:
      a node label.

      public Iterator<String> getNodes()
      Returns an iterator containing all nodes in this graph.
      Returns:
      an iterator for all nodes in this graph.

    • infectNode

      public boolean infectNode(String label)
      Infects the node with label label if it is susceptible.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to infect.
      Returns:
      true if the node exists and its state == NodeStates.SUSCEPTIBLE, false otherwise.

    • getState

      public hw4.GraphStates getState()
      Returns the current state of this graph.
      Returns:
      state

    • recoverNode

      public boolean recoverNode(String label)
      Causes the node with label label to recover if it is infected.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to cause to recover.
      Returns:
      true if the node exists and its state == NodeStates.INFECTED, false otherwise.

    • nodeExists

      public boolean nodeExists(String label)
      Returns true if the node with label label exists in this graph.
      Parameters:
      label - the node to check the existence of.
      Returns:
      true if nodes.get(label) != null, false otherwise.

    • getState

      public hw4.NodeStates getState(String label)
      Returns the current state of the node with label label.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to get the state of.
      Returns:
      nodes.get(label).getState() if the node with label label does not exist in this graph, returns null.

    • numNeighbors

      public int numNeighbors(String label)
      Returns the number of neighbors the node with label label has.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to get the number of neighbors of.
      Returns:
      nodes.get(label).numNeighbors() if the node with label label does not exist in this graph, returns -1.

    • getNeighbors

      public Iterator<String> getNeighbors(String label)
      Returns an iterator containing all neighbors of this node.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to get the neighbors of.
      Returns:
      an iterator for all neighbors of this node. if the node with label label does not exist in this graph, returns an empty iterator.
